tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HealthcareEquity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    community_name VARCHAR(50),
    healthcare_resources_allocated INT,
    population_size INT,
    healthcare_trends_analysis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_facilities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE community_health_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  community_id INT,
  population_size INT,
  healthcare_access_score FLOAT,
  resource_allocation_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_resources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    community_id INT,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    allocation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_name VARCHAR(255),
	age INT,
	gender VARCHAR(10),
	patient_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Doctor (
	doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
	specialty VARCHAR(50),
	hospital_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospital(hospital_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointment (
	appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	doctor_id INT,
	appointment_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctor(doctor_id)
);
